name: MazeTale
description:
MazeTale is a small game that I came up with while lying down in the evening. I didn't want to make big projects just small pixel art games that don't require a lot of space and aren't too complicated, and that's what MazeTale is, an adventure game telling the story of a creature who ended up in a maze full of creatures, keys and dots because of his ring. Help the little creature find the ring that will end this nightmare

THIS IS NOT A FULL GAME IT'S A DEMO!!!
